column5: I will be traveling for a few days in Ontario in late June and was hoping to fish for a day or two. I'll be flying into Toronto and working up in Longford Mills for a couple days. Does anyone have any suggestions for a guided trip for a day of walleyes or northerns? I don't know anything about the area, so any help is appreciated!
Perfect timing.....I'm going to be there in October and was wondering the same thing.
